website_summaries.verdict: The LunarStelos has all the makings of a handy, reliable, and lightweight trainer. Besides being very affordable, the superior comfort, excellent breathability, good arch support, and really cool looks should make this an easy option for neutral runners. The shoe has the speed to take on up-tempo runs as well as the cushioning and support for piling on the miles. Although an entry-level shoe, it should also be a very solid choice for seasoned runners during recovery days or for long and easy runs.
pros: Extremely comfortable is an expression that comes up in most of the reviews of the LunarStelos
A handful of runners loved its lightweight design
There are more than enough color options available
It is very flexible, based on some comments
A couple of runners valued the cool looks of this shoe
Breathability is very good, as noted by more than a few
This is a good training partner in the gym, according to more than a handful of reviewers
Some of those who are on their feet all day valued the cushioning and support of this shoe
cons: A significant number of runners were hugely disappointed by the overall lack of durability coming from this shoe
Although quite thick, the shoe does not have enough cushioning, according to some reviewers
It is a bit narrow for a few runners

customer_reviews.title: Teenage Boy Feet....
customer_reviews.text: My 13yr old son is H.A.R.D. on his shoes. He plays basketball, rides bikes, camps, hikes, etc and these Nike Mens Lunarstelos ALWAYS hold up. What better compliment can I give than "the shoe takes a teenage boy's beating and is still awesome:!!!
customer_reviews.author: Erin P.

customer_reviews.title: Best sneakers I've owned!
customer_reviews.text: These are my 2nd pair of Lunarstelos. My white pair were getting a little dirty but I loved them so I picked up a pair in black. Lightweight and comfortable. I'm thinking of getting a 3rd pair just in case they are discontinued. You cant go wrong with these. Great for running, the Gym, most Athletics. I can't say enough good things about them.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Borden

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Note: I wear size 10.5 shoes. I find that with Nike products I need to order a size up because my foot is a bit wide and has a high instep. I like these a lot. Similar but probably a bit more comfortable than the Lunarglides I own. These also look pretty cool. They look like they are black in pictures but are really kind of a iridescent dark blue/green. Perfect for S Florida!
customer_reviews.author: Ephi82

customer_reviews.title: The Lunarstelos are much narrower than my Nike Air Monarchs ...
customer_reviews.text: The Lunarstelos are much narrower than my Nike Air Monarchs, seem smaller and less toe room. I would probably order a half size larger, - if I ever ordered them again. I should have tried them on locally before buying online. They are lighter than my Air Monarchs.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Therriault

customer_reviews.title: Reviewing for the husband
customer_reviews.text: Reviewing this for my husband. He saw these shoes in a popular shoe store but I found them $20 cheaper here on Amazon. Since he's a guy, his review is of few words. Without further ado: "The sneakers are comfortable and so far seem to have plenty of cushion to lessen the impact of running. Though I don't use them all the time so I can't speak to their overall durability⁠⁠⁠⁠."
customer_reviews.author: K. Metzger

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, flexibility, comfortable, great price! My son says he loves the shoes and wants another pair in a different color. He's very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette Arnone

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable right out of the box. Walked miles and miles around Boston and my feet feel great. Have had lots of compliments and "Where did you find those?"
customer_reviews.author: W. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: I put inserts and and there was no issue - really good shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I find my feet to be in-between sizes, and this just ran on the larger side of that. I put inserts and and there was no issue - really good shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Koenigsfeld

customer_reviews.title: comfortable running shoe
customer_reviews.text: most confortable running shoe I've had . My only concern is that in 6 months of walking/runing 4 miles per day the treads are worn out.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Nike at its best
customer_reviews.text: Way better than I expected.. Very happy with this selection, especially after looking for shoes for three hours! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Christopher McCauley

customer_reviews.title: Fiance loves them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my fiance who is on his feet all day! He loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly as to size
customer_reviews.text: Husband liked them . Wears them all the time. Fit perfectly .
customer_reviews.author: Average Jane

customer_reviews.title: Husband is very happy with these!! And the price too!
customer_reviews.text: my husband says these are the most comfortable shoes he has ever worn!!! Happy husband, happy wife!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Bower

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I liked the style of the shoe. Great color and athletic looking. The shoe is very comfortable with the cushion sole. Would definitely recommend this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Nearly a year later and these shoes have held up great! Still look great too.
customer_reviews.author: Percy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: EXACTLY SAME AS SHOWN IN WEB SITE LOVE IT..... RECOMMEND......BUY IT
customer_reviews.author: Daljeet

customer_reviews.title: The perfect shoes for me!
customer_reviews.text: I already owned one pair of Nike Lunarstelos, so I knew that this new pair would fit me like a glove. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excelent service and excelent product
customer_reviews.text: The service and times were outstanding. The shoes feet me very well as they were expected to.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Sanchez Rubio

customer_reviews.title: i had some nike darts that i love so i thought these would be the same
customer_reviews.text: i got these because they were for a neutral stride since i walk on the outside of my feet. i had some nike darts that i love so i thought these would be the same. they are for the most part, they keep me walking normally but they are slowly killing my feet. they don't seem to be too tight anywhere but my toes are killing me. i wear them for an hour or so in the morning, mostly to walk my dog, and when i am able to take them off, the pain starts and lasts through the day. i'm stuck with these now, so goodbye foot comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Sousa

customer_reviews.title: three stars
customer_reviews.text: This was not the shoe I ordered, but avoiding the hassle of returning I decided to keep. Felt awkward after first day of use and walking very fast, I guess due to all my recent sneakers being Adidas. But after second day of use very comfortable for the gym material appears to be for rain and doesnt appear to soil easy, but the white outsole surounding portion of the shoe should be whipped down after every use.
customer_reviews.author: JM1

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe with support.
customer_reviews.text: I like these better than the Free's. They have more support. I've gotten a couple compliments so far on the looks. Overall it feels like I'm walking on air.
customer_reviews.author: jsi619
